work_experience.responsibilities: Ensure company compliance with federal and state laws for nine offices. Manage I-9 documentation, payroll processing, and employee relations. Create HR policies, maintain over 285 personnel records, and administer HRIS systems. Lead onboarding, open enrollment training, and benefits administration. Generate compensation spreadsheets, headcount reports, and manage vendor relationships. Serve as expatriate liaison and coordinate executive travel.

Provided 5-star service, managed multiple tables, coordinated ticket times with the chef, and trained new servers. Maintained professional conduct under high pressure, consistently achieving high customer satisfaction and sales-based tips averaging 18â€“25%.
Delivered premium dining experiences and ensured customer satisfaction. Delegated tasks to support staff, maintained smooth workflow, and trained dozens of new servers in service excellence.

Taught first-year university French courses, designed and graded exams, and led study groups. All students passed with a C or higher. Managed course materials, recorded grades, and was recommended for advanced teaching assignments.

projects.name: HRIS and Payroll System Implementation
projects.description: Led implementation of new time and attendance, onboarding, and payroll systems, reducing overall cost and processing time.

projects.name: Open Enrollment Training Program
projects.description: Developed and conducted annual training sessions for employees to explain benefit program updates.

awards.name: Top Seller
awards.description: Recognized multiple times for surpassing sales quotas and achieving top seller status in sales contests.
